New Records: Luka Doncic scored 27 points and recorded 13 assists in the game.
Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks scored the first 13 points of the second half and led by as many as 30 points during the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The Dallas Mavericks played without starting forward P.J. Washington and center Dereck Lively II due to injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of a five-game homestand for the Dallas Mavericks.
Others: The Chicago Bulls were without their leading scorer Zach LaVine due to a right adductor strain.
